title: Berserk: Ougon Jidai-hen III - Kourin
synopsis: The Band of the Hawk has dwindled in the year since Guts left them on his journey to forge his own destiny. Unaware of their fate, Guts returns to the Hawks—now being led by his former ally Casca—after a rumor about them passes his way. Once the saviors of the kingdom of Midland, the Band of the Hawk are now hunted as they desperately fight for their lives while plotting to free their leader, Griffith, after he was imprisoned for committing treason. But the man they save is far from the Griffith they remember.
voices: ['Iwanaga, Hiroaki', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Yukinari, Toa', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Miyake, Kenta', 'Kotobuki, Minako', 'Fujiwara, Takahiro', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki']
staff: [['Kubooka, Toshiyuki', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard', ' Key Animation']], ['Kanai, Jirou', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Animation Director', ' Key Animation']], ['Kanno, Toshiyuki', ['Episode Director']], ['Ohira, Shinya', ['Storyboard']]]
